description: This super green paella has 5 different green veggies and takes no time at all to make.
name: Green Paella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lemon, juice and zest of 1, 1 sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a wide pan on medium high heat and cook onion and garlic for 5 minutes to soften. Stir in the turmeric and paprika and cook for 2 minutes.

Add the rice and stir to coat well. Pour over the vegetable stock and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the zucchini, asparagus and tenderstem broccoli and cook for 10 minutes, until the liquid has almost completely evaporated.
Stir through the peas, spinach, lemon juice and zest, remove from the heat, cover with foil and leave to stand for 5 minutes.
Scatter over the chopped parsley and cracked black pepper, add lemon wedges and serve.
